description: After a hard day of fighting bad guys, Detective Bennett Anthony can’t wait to get home and unwind. When he arrives there, he’s surprised to see his ex-husband, Mike De Marko, inside his apartment, cooking him dinner. At first, Bennett regrets not taking back Mike’s key. However, he soon feels at ease as Mike shows just how eager he is to stuff his cute face with Bennett’s fat crime-fighting cock.
title: The Mysteries Of Bennett Part 1
